item.title: Indian Income Tax Complete Certification Course
item.description: Do you find it difficult to understand the Income Tax laws? Or are you struggling with filing your own income tax return? Many a time we hear people saying that they don’t understand tax, they are not aware of when tax is to be deducted (TDS), they find it difficult to apply for their own PAN number or they find it difficult to file their return of income. So, friends to simplify all your problems and giving you an excellent clarity of all concepts, we have made this course on “Income Tax” presented by Direct and Corporate Tax expert CA Natasha Shah.
